page.title: 20SCIENCE & TECH. in EASTLEIGH
page.content: Eastleigh does not boast any High _ Tech Industries but there are signs that modern technology is making itself felt. I.B.M. the large computer manufacturer,has taken over some of the new offices in the town. In the industrial areas of the town there are quite a lot of printers and typesetters,the largest being Joseph Caustons,who produce high quality books.The majority of these companies are modernising their production and installing computerised machinery. Point of sale computers are becoming more evident in the form of Bar Code Readers in large supermarkets. All of the banks in the town now have Cash Dispensers which are linked to a central computer in London.
